briefTitle: Study of Fampridine-SR Tablets in Multiple Sclerosis Patients
officialTitle: Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Oral Fampridine-SR (10 mg b.i.d. [Bis in Die, Twice Daily]) in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis
summary: The purpose of the study is to show that individuals treated with Fampridine-SR tablets are significantly more likely to have consistent improvements in their walking than those treated with placebo tablets.

primaryOutcome.measure: Responders Based Upon the Timed 25-Foot Walk [T25FW]
